comments: She tries too hard to be cool. I understand that she picks out content like George Carlin speeches to hold the classes interest but really let\'s read some Camus or something.

She is a nice teacher, but she gives a lot of homework. She doesn\'t explain well on what she expected. Intense homework are given out in 8 weeks of summer class. If you really love writing, recommend to take her, otherwise... you will suffer like i do.

Shannon is at first fairly intimidating, however she is perhaps the best writing professor I have ever had. She is extremely fair and the only worry you should have is making sure you show up. Attendance is key. Loved her class.
Very nice professor. Does her best to teach writing
